title: Support Providers
description: Rocky Linux is commercially supported by CIQ, our founding partner and sponsor, as well as other non-affiliated companies.

ciq.name: CIQ
ciq.blurb: We believe in helping people do great things. This is why CIQ is a founding partner of the RESF. We provide commercial support and services for Rocky Linux to customers in research, academia, government, enterprise, partners, and everyone in between.
